description:
cmd/go: Update documentation of go run to match current behaviour.

Fixes issue 5511.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

please cd into cmd/go and run mkdoc.sh to update doc.go
and then add doc.go to this CL.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=731724b03c62 ***

Fixes issue 5511.
